email.subject: Backup Server is good to go!
email.body:
Hello #PLAYERNAME#!
I got your new backup server up and running. It is secondhand, though, and the previous owner had a few requests for the next owner (AKA you.)
Firstly they want the new owner to delete a text file called "DeleteThis.txt" in the home folder. They also want you to download whatever program is in the /bin directory, and run it- whenever you're not busy.
Also, I'm sorry in advance, but I forgot the password. I'll email you it as soon as I can. I wrote down the old password but I just changed it for security. You might actually need to break in, again, I'm sorry.
Thanks for the money! -Anonymous

attachments.note: Break into your backup server. Delete "DeleteThis.txt" Download the program in /bin Disconnect.
